description: System-generated unique key for this GIS integration configuration.
Base endpoint of the external GIS service accessed through the proxy.
Account name used by the application to authenticate to the GIS service.
Secret credential used with the username to authenticate to the GIS service; typically stored encrypted.
Application identifier for OAuth/token-based authentication to the GIS service; confirm with SME.
Application secret paired with the identifier for OAuth/token-based authentication; confirm with SME.
User or process that created this configuration record.
Timestamp when the configuration record was created.
User or process that last modified this configuration record.
Timestamp when the configuration record was last updated.
